name: Monsters in my basement
description:
Warning: The game is in extreme alpha and tests stage, so may have a lot of bugs and grammar errors(especially because it's just one person making this game, and english ins't my first lenguage).

 The story is still not done, this demo is still just the first part of the prologue and soon will be expanded more and more. 

Story: Leena is a teeneger that recieved a note from her old friend Bel to come live in his house, getting there she hears  a strange noise comming from the basement, and now needs to discover why there's monsters in her basement, where is her friend, and why she feels something strange.
